channel.title: math.SP updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SP updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Eigenvalue clusters for the hemisphere Laplacian with variable Robin condition
item.description: arXiv:2309.07044v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We study the eigenvalue clusters of the Robin Laplacian on the 2-dimensional hemisphere with a variable Robin coefficient on the equator. The $\ell$'th cluster has $\ell+1$ eigenvalues. We determine the asymptotic density of eigenvalues in the $\ell$'th cluster as $\ell$ tends to infinity. This density is given by an explicit integral involving the even part of the Robin coefficient.
item.dc:creator: Alexander Pushnitski, Igor Wigman
